text: Ruin The Memory is an album by British heavy metal band Gutworm, released in 2004. == Track listing == # What You Are - 3:00 # Loveless - 4:49 # Below Within - 2:42 # Obscure Devotion - 5:52 # Saturate in Sadness - 2:19 # Sick Inside - 5:20 # Blind from Truth - 3:37 # Incineration - 1:54 # Twisted - 4:53 # Reborn - 4:11 Category:Gutworm albums Category:2004 albums
title: Ruin the Memory
